tripCommits.autoCommit.markdownDescription:
Control whether the extension should commit files after: forming the message or closing the editor tab.

When `#git.enableSmartCommit#` enabled and `#git.smartCommitChanges#` was set to `all`, It allows to commit all changes when there are no staged changes.

And set `#git.postCommitCommand#` to `sync` to run `git.sync` after commit.

tripCommits.silentAutoCommit.markdownDescription: Control that auto commit should be silent, without focusing source control panel.

tripCommits.showEditor.markdownDescription: Control whether the extension should show the commit message as a text document in a separate tab.

tripCommits.emojiFormat.markdownDescription: Specify which format will be shown in the `gitmoji`.

tripCommits.gitmoji.markdownDescription: Control whether the extension should prompt for a `gitmoji`.

tripCommits.lineBreak.markdownDescription:
Specify which word will be treated as line breaks in the `body`.

Blank means no line breaks.

tripCommits.promptBody.markdownDescription: Control whether the extension should prompt for the `body` section.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
